item.title: Chicken shop flytip - 3rd week in a row, 20th July
item.description:
Thank you for clearing the same flytip caused by a chicken shop dumping its waste over night on Saturdays the last two weekends. Unfortunately a disgusting habit appears to have formed and their waste is being dumped in the exact same spot (probably on their way home) every Saturday night. This is completely unacceptable and costing Council Tax payers unnecessary cost. I suggest the waste currently dumped last night is examined to determine and hold those responsible to account.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatcham Street, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shitty toilet is still there, 20th July
